articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Elon Musk not attending Vibrant Gujarat but Tesla welcome to invest: Official
articles.description: The state is very keen to get Tesla if it comes to India, Managing Director of Gujarat Industrial Development Corporation Rahul Gupta said.
articles.content: Amid speculation that Elon Musk will visit Gujarat, a senior government official on Wednesday said the billionairefounder of Tesla is not coming for the ongoing Vibrant Gujarat Global Summit, but th… [+1670 chars]

articles.title: This tiny EV crossover from VinFast will go on sale in the US
articles.description: The diminutive and blocky VF3 costs just $12,200 in Vietnam.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ If our comments are anything to go by, there is a huge demand out there for a small, cheap EV. Well, this is a small, cheap EV from VinFast.
